verses.text: \w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* \w has|strong="H1004"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w her|strong="H1129"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; she \w has|strong="H1004"\w* carved \w out|strong="H2672"\w* \f + \fr 9:1 \ft Hebrew; LXX, Syriac, and Aramaic Targum has set up\f* \w her|strong="H1129"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*.

She has \w prepared|strong="H6186"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* meat \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w mixed|strong="H4537"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; she has also \w set|strong="H6186"\w* \w her|strong="H4537"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

\w She|strong="H7121"\w* has \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* maidservants; \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w calls|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heights|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H7176"\w*.

“\w Whoever|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w*!” \w she|strong="H3820"\w* says \w to|strong="H3820"\w* him \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w lacks|strong="H2638"\w* judgment.

“\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* \w my|strong="H8354"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w have|strong="H3899"\w* \w mixed|strong="H4537"\w*.

\w Leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w your|strong="H5800"\w* \w folly|strong="H6612"\w* \w behind|strong="H5800"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H5800"\w* \w will|strong="H5800"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; \w walk|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* understanding.”

\w He|strong="H3947"\w* \w who|strong="H7563"\w* \w corrects|strong="H3256"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mocker|strong="H3887"\w* brings \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* on himself; \w he|strong="H3947"\w* \w who|strong="H7563"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* taints himself.

Do \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mocker|strong="H3887"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* he \w will|strong="H2450"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w*; \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H2450"\w* he \w will|strong="H2450"\w* love \w you|strong="H6435"\w*.

\w Instruct|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w*; \w teach|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w learning|strong="H3948"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* understanding.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w through|strong="H3588"\w* wisdom \f + \fr 9:11 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Aramaic Targum; Hebrew through me\f* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

If \w you|strong="H5375"\w* are \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* are \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* \w to|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* own advantage; but if \w you|strong="H5375"\w* scoff, \w you|strong="H5375"\w* alone will \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* consequences. The Way of Folly

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* woman named \w Folly|strong="H3687"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w loud|strong="H1993"\w*; \w she|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w naive|strong="H6615"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w*.

\w She|strong="H5921"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heights|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H7176"\w*,

“\w Whoever|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w here|strong="H2008"\w*!” \w she|strong="H3820"\w* says \w to|strong="H3820"\w* him \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w lacks|strong="H2638"\w* judgment.

“\w Stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w sweet|strong="H4985"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* eaten \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* tasty!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H7496"\w* \f + \fr 9:18 \ft Hebrew the Rephaim\f* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w depths|strong="H6012"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*.
